Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I mean i find it hard to ask my teachers foor help, either cause of confidence levels or just difficulty in knowing who to asdk in such a big faculty, therefore i use AI to ask and usually it does help but tbh chatgpt has been slacking these days tryna find a better alternative

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teacher made me feel uneasy sending a message and waiting for a reply, chatgpt always has my back and responds instantly with no judgement

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: chatgpt there is no shame in asking more and more questions or asking it to be simpler or shorter etc, with a human you cannot do that
